subj-group.subject: Symposium: Modern/Postmodern Public Administration: A Discourse about What is Real

title-group.article-title: Round #1: The Postmodern Turn and the Socratic Gadfly

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1995 The Public Administration Theory Network
